Mindful Practices: Course 2
SEL Competencies and Experiential Practices

CASEL's First Three Competencies

Now we’ll take some time to explore CASEL’s first three SEL competencies through experiential practices designed for students and adults to integrate into the classroom.

  • Introduce the SEL Note Planning Journal - MP will revise into a spreadsheet
  • Ask learners to complete the journal as they go through the next three pages. Tell them that they will use the info for a discussion board post at the end of the module. Let learners know that they don't need to submit the document in the discussion board.
  • Change directions on the next three pages > tell learners to fill out the SEL Note Planning Journal and will use that doc to complete a discussion board post at the end of the module.
  • At the end of the section, have one discussion board that asks the same questions that we already have
